text:
[Verse]
Walking down the avenue
Lights are shining all around
City heartbeat booming loud
Lost but never feeling down

[Verse 2]
Neon signs and crowded lanes
Faces blur like falling rain
No map and no destination
Just the thrill of exploration

[Chorus]
Wandering the streets tonight
City lights so bright so bright
Feel the rhythm in my soul
Letting go and losing control

[Verse 3]
Listening to the sirens wail
Distant echoes in the night
Heartbeat racing through the crowd
Lost but everything feels right

[Chorus]
Wandering the streets tonight
City lights so bright so bright
Feel the rhythm in my soul
Letting go and losing control

[Bridge]
Every step is a new beat
Every face a symphony
In this urban jungle wild
I'm a free and fearless child
title: Wandering The Streets
